1225720.name: Rainbow Reactor Soundtrack
1225720.description:
This is the Original Soundtrack for Rainbow Reactor! Nine synthwave tracks with a definitive '80s vibe that have been re-mixed to longer versions of what is included in the game. Additionally, there are three bonus tracks as well as uncompressed WAV files of all titles.

With the release of Rainbow Reactor: Fusion on Oculus Quest, we have added another 4 tracks from the new game, so it contains the complete music of both titles!

Thank you for supporting the development of Rainbow Reactor & further titles from Tunermaxx / Muikkumedia Oy by purchasing this OST :D
1225720.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
